com.tineye.services
Class MatchEngineRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.tineye.services.TinEyeServiceRequest
      com.tineye.services.MatchEngineRequest

public class MatchEngineRequest
extends TinEyeServiceRequest

Provides methods to call the MatchEngine API methods.

For a list of available MatchEngine API methods, refer to the documentation for your MatchEngine API installation.

Copyright (C) 2011-2012 Idee Inc. All rights reserved worldwide.

apiURL - The MatchEngine API URL

Method Detail

addImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject addImage(Image[] images)
                                throws TinEyeServiceException
Add the images in images to the hosted image collection.

If the images have their collection filepaths set, add the images to the hosted image collection using those paths. Otherwise, use the local image filepaths to specify the image filepath in the hosted image collection.

If hosted image collection filepaths are used, each image must have a collection filepath specified or the API will return an error.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: add
  • result: Empty array
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
images - List of images to add to the hosted collection
Returns:
The API JSON response with the image addition status
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the API add request or parsing the response

addURL

public net.sf.json.JSONObject addURL(Image[] images)
                              throws TinEyeServiceException
Add the images in images to the hosted image collection using their URLs.

Each Image in images must have a URL and their collection filepath set.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: add
  • result: Empty array
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
images - List of images with URLs and collection filepaths to add to the hosted image collection.
Returns:
The API JSON response with the status of the image addition
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the API add request or parsing the response

searchImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchImage(Image image,
                                          int minScore,
                                          int offset,
                                          int limit,
                                          boolean checkHorizontalFlip)
                                   throws TinEyeServiceException
Search the hosted image collection using an image and return any matches with corresponding scores.

Returns the MatchEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of the match
    • overlay: URL pointing to the match overlay image on the API server
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
image - The image to search for
minScore - Minimum score to return for results
offset - Offset to start returning results from (starting from 0)
limit - Maximum number of results to return
checkHorizontalFlip - If true, also search for horizontally flipped image in collection
Returns:
The MatchEngine API JSON response with search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the MatchEngine API search request or parsing the response

searchFilepath

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchFilepath(java.lang.String filepath,
                                             int minScore,
                                             int offset,
                                             int limit,
                                             boolean checkHorizontalFlip)
                                      throws TinEyeServiceException
Search the hosted image collection using the filepath of an image in the hosted image collection and return any matches with corresponding scores.

Returns the MatchEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of the match
    • overlay: URL pointing to the match overlay image on the API server
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
filepath - A filepath of an image already in the collection as returned by a search or list operation
minScore - Minimum score to return for results
offset - Offset to start returning results from (starting from 0)
limit - Maximum number of results to return
checkHorizontalFlip - If true, also search for horizontally flipped image in the collection
Returns:
The MatchEngine API JSON response with search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the MatchEngine API search request or parsing the response

searchURL

public net.sf.json.JSONObject searchURL(java.lang.String url,
                                        int minScore,
                                        int offset,
                                        int limit,
                                        boolean checkHorizontalFlip)
                                 throws TinEyeServiceException
Search the hosted image collection using an image URL and return any matches with corresponding scores.

Returns the MatchEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: search
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of the match
    • overlay: URL pointing to the match overlay image on the API server
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
url - The URL to the image to search for against the hosted image collection
minScore - Minimum score to return for results
offset - Offset to start returning results from (starting from 0)
limit - Maximum number of results to return
checkHorizontalFlip - If true, also search for horizontally flipped image in collection
Returns:
The MatchEngine API JSON response with search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the MatchEngine API search request or parsing the response

compareImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject compareImage(Image image1,
                                           Image image2,
                                           int minScore,
                                           boolean checkHorizontalFlip)
                                    throws TinEyeServiceException
Compare image1 to image2 and return the match score.

Returns the MatchEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: compare
  • result: Array with a single JSON object match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of the match
    • match_percent: Percentage of images that matched
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
image1 - The first image to compare using its data
image2 - The second image to compare using its data
minScore - The minimum score of the result to return
checkHorizontalFlip - If true, also check if image2 is the horizontally flipped version of image1
Returns:
The MatchEngine API JSON response with compare results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the MatchEngine API compare request or parsing the response

compareURL

public net.sf.json.JSONObject compareURL(java.lang.String url1,
                                         java.lang.String url2,
                                         int minScore,
                                         boolean checkHorizontalFlip)
                                  throws TinEyeServiceException
Compare the image at url1 to the image at url2 and return the match score.

Returns the MatchEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: compare
  • result: Array with a single JSON object match with the following fields:
    • score: Relevance score of the match
    • match_percent: Percentage of images that matched
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
url1 - URL to the first image to compare
url2 - URL to the second image to compare
minScore - The minimum score of the result to return
checkHorizontalFlip - If true, also check if image at url2 is the horizontally flipped version of image at url1
Returns:
The MatchEngine API JSON response with the compare results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If exception occurs issuing the MatchEngine API compare request or parsing the response
